rows.label: qev092106_MSG0001
rows.name: Thank you, Alexa. You saved my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0002
rows.name: I'm sorry we couldn't help Hannah or Fernand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0003
rows.name: No. If anyone could have helped them, it was us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0004
rows.name:
He's right. Plus, you saved us.
That's amazing enough, and we're grateful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0005
rows.name: I think you've proven you're a lot more than just a Skell nut.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0006
rows.name: Yeah, I'm a SUPER Skell nut! I should buy a cape.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0007
rows.name: What makes you love them so much?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0008
rows.name:
When the Whale was shot down and we all crashed here,
a jet-black Skell saved my life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0009
rows.name:
It shielded me from a hailstorm of bullets
and gave me time to run.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0010
rows.name:
I don't know who was piloting it
or what division they were from...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0011
rows.name: But I loved Skells from that moment on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0012
rows.name:
And now it's my dream to save
someone's life like that someday.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev092106_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that sounds like the Alexa you know.

rows.label: qev092106_JNK0020
rows.name: Observe

rows.label: qev092106_SEL0021
rows.name: Note that Camber pilots a jet-black Skell.

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0013
rows.name: Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0013_2
rows.name: I just wish more people got it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0014
rows.name: That still seems pretty out-there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0015
rows.name: Hey, who cares? We're alive because of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0016
rows.name: That's true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0017
rows.name:
Let's get you guys back home.
We need to put your Skells in for repair.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0018
rows.name:
Not to ruin the Skell love-in, but...
shouldn't the two of us go to maintenance first?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0019
rows.name: What? Why? You can walk just fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0020
rows.name: I think this girl may be insane. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0021
rows.name: Insane for SKELLS! Oh yeah, baby![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0022
rows.name: Whaaat? No. It wasn't Camber. No way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0023
rows.name:
He's nowhere near good enough to move like that.
That pilot was so precise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0024
rows.name: Hey! I'm standing right here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0025
rows.name:
It WAS incredible how Camber shielded me
from that blast, though. I was amazed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0026
rows.name:
There, see? That's the sort of experience
that gives birth to a true Skell nut.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0027
rows.name: Shouldn't it give birth to a true Camber nut?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0028
rows.name: A normal person might think that, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092106_MSG0029
rows.name:
No way! It's the Skell that's amazing here.
I'm not budging on this one![ST:wait ]
